fields.name: AllRecommendationDetails
fields.description: The list of all benefit recommendations with the recommendation details.

fields.name: CommitmentGranularity
fields.description: Grain of the proposed commitment amount. Supported values: 'Hourly'

fields.name: CostWithoutBenefit
fields.description: The current cost without benefit, corresponds to 'totalHours' in the look-back period.

fields.name: CurrencyCode
fields.description: An ISO 4217 currency code identifier for the costs and savings amounts.

fields.name: FirstConsumptionDate
fields.description: The first usage date used for looking back for computing the recommendations.

fields.name: LastConsumptionDate
fields.description: The last usage date used for looking back for computing the recommendations.

fields.name: LookBackPeriod
fields.description: The number of days of usage evaluated for computing the recommendations.

fields.name: RecommendationDetails
fields.description: The details of the proposed recommendation.

fields.name: Scope
fields.description: Benefit scope. For example, Single or Shared.

fields.name: Term
fields.description: Term period of the benefit. For example, P1Y or P3Y.

fields.name: TotalHours
fields.description: The total hours for which the cost is covered. Its equal to number of records in a property 'properties/usage/charges'.

fields.name: Usage
fields.description: On-demand charges between firstConsumptionDate and lastConsumptionDate that were used for computing benefit recommendations.
